resolution-width.name: Resolution Width (If 0, Uses Window Width)
resolution-width.description: The width of the image. Set to 0 to use window width.

resolution-height.name: Resolution Height (If 0, Uses Window Height)
resolution-height.description: The height of the image. Set to 0 to use window height.

jpeg-mafia.name: Output to JPEG
jpeg-mafia.description: Use JPEG for images instead of PNG

auto-screenshot.name: Auto Screenshot
auto-screenshot.description: Automatically take a screenshot with a given percentage interval.

auto-percent.name: Auto Screenshot Percentage Interval
auto-percent.description: Set the percentage interval for automatic screenshots.
